name: Melanchrome
description:
Submission for Global Game Jam 2021

Theme: Lost and Found

A 2D monochrome side scroller platformer parkour game. Story of a person who has lost his emotions, joy and color in his life. His perspective of the world is melancholic and depressive. During the game, he encounters different scenarios that sparks his feelings and find back the emotions and the colors he lost once.

Developer: Berkay Tekin Oz

Designer: Mercan Arapoglu

Level Designer: Talha Ucar

Sound Designer: Batuhan Yildiz
